author: Sky_guardian
title: Good buy!
review:
I got this set half off here's pro and cons
Pros
works well
looks cool
jumps over the blocker thing
fun to play with
Cons
None
a great buy and i think it's better than the desert hopper but that's my opinion
it also lands on all four wheels most of the time

author: Alemas
title: Great car!
review:
This car is very nice, as it has cool decals, a powerful pull-back motor, and cool black wheels! The ramp has a "gate" which can be easily smashed through when jumping!

Pros:

Cool car
Lot of cool stickers
Ramp
Cool wheels

Cons:

The "gate" is very fragile

Overall, a great car!
